title: Resident Evil: Code Veronica X  HD [PS3] [PSN]
description:
Resident Evil: Code Veronica X in HD for ps3.
US version, NPUB30467.

Within includes the Resident Evil pkg file, the game's rap file in the exdata folder, reactpsn 2.26, and instructions. 

I can confirm this to work with Rebug 4.30, 4.41, and 4.46.


To Install.

1. Install RE code veronica x and reactpsn.(Unless of course you already have
   reactpsn)

2. Place "exdata" folder on flash drive.

3. Put flash drive in the right usb port.

4. Create a new user and name it "aa".

5. Run reactpsn and do not press any buttons.

6. Play the game!
